item.title: Aviation
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 50 ml gin
  • 20 ml lemon juice
  • 10 ml Maraschino liqueur
  • 5 ml sugar syrup
  • 5ml crème de violette (optional)
  • (garnish) cocktail cherry

Instructions

Shake ingredients with ice. Serve in cocktail glass. Garnish.

item.title: Caipirinha
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml cachaça
  • 1/2 lime
  • 15 ml sugar syrup

Instructions

Muddle quartered lime and syrup in a rocks glass. Add ice and cachaça and stir.

item.title: Daiquiri
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml rum
  • 20 ml lime juice
  • 10 ml sugar syrup
  • lime zest
  • (garnish) lime slice

Instructions

Shake ingredients with ice. Serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish.

item.title: Hemingway special
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml rum
  • 30 ml grapefruit juice
  • 15 ml lime juice
  • 15 ml Maraschino liqueur
  • 5 ml sugar syrup
  • (garnish) lime slice

Instructions

Shake ingredients with ice. Serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish.

item.title: Mojito
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml rum
  • 20 ml lime juice
  • 20 ml sugar syrup
  • a few mint leaves
  • soda water
  • (garnish) mint sprig

Instructions

Crush ice in clean tea towel. Lightly clap mint. Add ingredients except soda to highball glass. Add crushed ice and stir briefly, and top with soda water. Garnish.

item.title: Old fashioned
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml rye whisky or bourbon
  • 5 ml sugar syrup
  • 4 dashes aromatic bitters
  • (garnish) orange twist
  • (garnish) cocktail cherry

Instructions

Stir ingredients over ice. Serve in a rocks glass over ice. Garnish.

item.title: Pisco sour
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 45 ml pisco
  • 30 ml lime juice
  • 15 ml sugar syrup
  • 1/2 egg white
  • (garnish) aromatic bitters
  • (garnish) lime slice

Instructions

Dry shake ingredients. Then shake with ice. Serve in a rocks glass without ice. Garnish with drops of bitters and a lime slice.

item.title: Sazerac
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml rye whisky
  • 5 ml sugar syrup
  • 4 dashes creole bitters
  • 4 dashes absinthe
  • (garnish) lemon twist

Instructions

Rinse glass with absinthe. Stir ingredients over ice. Serve in a rocks glass without ice. Garnish.

item.title: Southside
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml gin
  • 30 ml lime juice
  • 15 ml sugar syrup
  • 1 mint sprig
  • (garnish) 1 mint leaf

Instructions

Shake ingredients with ice. Serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish.

item.title: Tom Collins
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml gin
  • 30 ml lemon juice
  • 15 ml sugar syrup
  • soda water
  • (garnish) lemon or lime slice

Instructions

Add ingredients except soda to highball glass and stir to combine. Add soda water to halfway up glass. Fill glass with ice. Garnish.

item.title: Whiskey sour
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml bourbon
  • 30 ml lemon juice
  • 15 ml sugar syrup
  • 4 dashes orange bitters
  • 1/2 egg white (optional)
  • (garnish) cocktail cherry
  • (garnish) orange twist

Instructions

Dry shake ingredients. Then shake with ice. Serve in a rocks glass over ice. Garnish.
